title: Valiamcep Women's Summer Ribbed Tank Dress Scoop Neck Slim Fit Sleeveless Bodycon Mini Dresses
description: Valiamcep women's sexy ribbed dress is made with high quality cotton knit soft fabrics, skin-friendly,lightweight and great stretchy, make you more comfortable. Excellent stretching ensures fit for different size, excellence in workmanship makes stylish look.This bodycon dress is a must-have Item for every women’s wardrobe.

Feature: Slim fit, crew neck,round neck, scoop neck, solid color, long sleeve, above knee, stretchy ribbed knit, basic mini dress, bodycon dress gives you a modern and edgy look in this spring , autumn and winter.

Occasion: The basic dress is suit for casual, daily, shopping, lounge, vacation, evening party, wedding, prom, cocktail, club, bar, dating pairing with accessories . Also suitable for under 3 month maternity, Casual style and popular look in all season, especially autumn , winter and spring.

Match:You can wear the short mini basic dress alone, it looks simple and sexy, and It’s perfect match with a jacket or coat in fall or winter，Pair with your favorite sandals and heels or boots for a daily wear look!
Size Reference:The tank dress is true to size, please refer to the size chart Valiamcep offered. Washing Instructions/ Hand wash cold/Gentle machine wash/Don’t Bleach/Hang Or Line Dry.
